@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);
/*######## 通用 ########*/

#space{margin-top:0 !important;}
     .mtw.mbw .hm .avt.avtm img{height:120px !important;}/*卡饭访问未授权用户空间时,头像会被压扁问题处理*/
body{margin-top:0 !important;}

@-webkit-keyframes scaleout{0%{-webkit-transform:scale(0)}100%{-webkit-transform:scale(1);opacity:0}}@keyframes scaleout{0%{transform:scale(0);-webkit-transform:scale(0)}100%{transform:scale(1);-webkit-transform:scale(1);opacity:0}}.B70Reb,.f4a,.tta{padding:6px!important}.tubEcf.pTNgyc,.bxpCne,.tubEcf{-webkit-filter:invert(1)!important;filter:invert(1)!important}.NPc{margin-top:2px!important}.tQb{margin-bottom:8px!important}.Ee,.Lub .Xa,.X9b,.f4a,.l4a{border-radius:0!important}.b-p,.eGFnrc,.l4a,.t-C-z{box-shadow:none!important}.IO,.Rzc,.Xa,.aac,.l4a,.nfe,.qac,.WdjWF,.WpuQke{background:#202020!important}.Ee,.xac{background-color:#252525!important}.Kza{background-color:#2d2d2d!important}.tQb,.xac{background:#121212!important}.f4a{background:rgba(0,0,0,.3)!important}.Gub,.Hac,.Hub,.Iac,.Jub,.M7Fqc,.Pac,.SR,.YGETNc,.bS,.dR.d-s,.dhb,.vy{color:silver!important}.TC,.TR,.WR,.bS,.fr,.vy{background-color:transparent!important}.Vzc .lg{background:rgba(25,25,25,.25)!important;margin-top:10px!important;margin-bottom:5px!important;padding-top:10px!important}.Fr+.bj,.fr>.vt{border-color:rgba(100,100,100,.5)!important}.Kza a,.Rpa,.TD,.Ub,.sQb:link{color:#2793e6!important}.xQb{color:silver!important}.i4a{opacity:.7!important}.i4a:hover{opacity:1!important}.Iqx3wf{opacity:.4!important}.Iqx3wf:hover{opacity:.7!important}.Iub:hover{opacity:1!important}.gac{opacity:.65!important}.Kza:after{border-color:#373737 transparent transparent!important}.Kza:before{border-color:rgba(25,25,25,.25) transparent transparent!important}.MNn0h{background-color:#323232!important}.MNn0h:hover{background-color:#3f3f3f!important}.Qgb,.khb,.shb,.vKFgJc{-webkit-filter:invert(1)!important;filter:invert(1)!important}.oe .gd{background:#2392FF!important;border-color:#000!important;color:#FFF!important}.Kub .vwa{opacity:.6!important}.Kub .vwa:hover{opacity:.8!important}.x2oYAc{opacity:.7!important}.rac{background:rgba(0,0,0,.3)!important;padding:8px!important;margin-top:2px!important;margin-bottom:2px!important}.Ygb{background:url(data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAABIAAAAKCAYAAAC5Sw6hAAAALUlEQVQoz2M4cOAAAxr+Tw5moKVBJOH///+DMU0MIstLNDVo8ITRfzIxbQwCADvH9Iyo/riMAAAAAElFTkSuQmCC)!important;height:10px!important;width:18px!important}.Sgb{background:url(data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAABAAAAAQAgMAAABinRfyAAAACVBMVEUAAHTMzMyZmZk2gg6fAAAAAXRSTlMAQObYZgAAACtJREFUCNdjYEAFTA1MDQxMAawNDAwhokC+aAiQYA2AEWAuSAKsBKwYFQAA7noGBWhj/m8AAAAASUVORK5CYII=)!important}.ISc,.Pu5TY,.RWdWXd,.Tzc{width:32px;height:32px;margin:0 auto;background-image:none!important;background-color:silver!important;border-radius:100%;-webkit-animation:scaleout 1s infinite ease-in-out;animation:scaleout 1s infinite ease-in-out}.Kgb,.Y8b .TD,.ki{border-radius:2px!important}.BJa,.DJa,.cp,.mj,.wu,.yJa{background-color:#232323!important}.Dwa.e4,.E5,.cp,.wu{box-shadow:-1px -1px 2px #191919 inset!important;background-color:#323232!important;border-color:#232323!important;color:silver!important}.Jea,.Mga{margin-top:1px!important;border-top-color:#323232!important;border-right-color:#323232!important}.tvb{background:#7d7d7d!important}.tvb,.tvb .d-s{color:#000!important}.ki{background-color:rgba(25,25,25,.25)!important;padding:10px!important;margin:0!important}.IO{border-color:transparent!important}.Xa{padding-bottom:10px!important}.Kgb,.Y8b .TD{background-color:#2793e6!important;color:#191919!important}.Aq,.OF,.d-A-B,.dn,.xN .d-y-r-c-ha{color:silver!important}.sf010c{color:#fff!important}.ve.oba{color:gray!important}.dga{background-color:#4b4b4b!important;border-color:#232323!important;color:silver!important}.dga a:not(.ot-hashtag){color:#2793e6!important}.vDc{opacity:.5!important}.d-r,.r3 .r0,.xN.d-y-r-c{background:rgba(25,25,25,.25)!important;border:1px solid transparent!important;color:silver!important}.ot-hashtag,.proflink,.proflinkPrefix{color:#fff!important}.Evd,.kOc,.kbc,.nbc .xta .spd,.obc{background-color:#232323!important}

.Dwa.e4,.E5,.cp,.nbc,.wu{border-color:#232323!important}.Dwa.e4,.E5,.FnlLyd,.G-q,.cp,.d-A,.wu,.zvd{color:silver!important}.nbc{background-color:#232323!important}.mj{background-color:transparent!important}.Dwa.e4,.E5,.cp,.wu{box-shadow:-1px -1px 2px #191919 inset!important;background-color:#323232!important}.G-q,.G-q-B,.G-q-O,.d-r{background:#292929!important}.d-A-yb{background:#393939!important;border-color:transparent!important}.Jea,.Mga{border-color:#323232 #323232 transparent transparent!important;top:2px!important}.FnlLyd{background-color:#4b4b4b!important;border-radius:3px!important}.FnlLyd:hover{background-color:#555!important;border-color:#555!important}.IGPVEc{background-image:url(data:image/png;base64,)!important;background-position:0!important}

.g-h-f-vc-B{background:#121212!important;border:1px solid #030303!important}.g-h-f-vc-B:hover{border:1px solid #454545!important}.g-h-f-N-N::-moz-placeholder{color:#e9e9e9!important}.d-r{background:#232323!important}.g-h-f-m-Ed-wc-E,.g-h-f-m-de-E,.g-h-f-m-wc-E{-webkit-filter:invert(1)!important;filter:invert(1)!important}.d-A{color:silver!important}.d-A-u .d-A-B,.d-A-yb .d-A-B{color:#fff!important}.d-cm{border-top:1px solid #575757!important}.d-A-u,.d-A-yb{background-color:#424242!important;border-color:#050505!important}
.signin-card .profile-img,.circle,.zHvs5{border-radius:5%!important}
.yt-badge{background-color:#3c3c3c;border-color:#444;color:#b6b6b6}
#creator-subheader{border-bottom:none!important}.yt-uix-tooltip{margin:0 1px 1px 15px!important}

sections.code:
/* CodeMirror */BODY>div.CodeMirror>div.CodeMirror-scroll{font-family: "Source Code Pro","Anonymous Pro","Envy Code R","Inconsolata","mononoki","Consolas","Menlo","Monaco","DejaVu Sans Mono","Liberation Mono","Nimbus Roman No9 L","Times New Roman","Courier New","Microsoft YaHei UI","Microsoft YaHei","Microsoft JhengHei UI","Microsoft JhengHei","SimHei","SimSun","KaiTi","WenQuanYi Micro Hei","WenQuanYi Zen Hei","Hiragino Sans GB" !important;font-size:14px !important;line-height:15pt !important;}
/* Orion */#clientDiv>DIV , #clientDiv>DIV>SPAN , .rulerLines.odd , .rulerLines.even{font-family: "Source Code Pro","Anonymous Pro","Envy Code R","Inconsolata","mononoki","Consolas","Menlo","Monaco","DejaVu Sans Mono","Liberation Mono","Nimbus Roman No9 L","Times New Roman","Courier New","Microsoft YaHei UI","Microsoft YaHei","Microsoft JhengHei UI","Microsoft JhengHei","SimHei","SimSun","KaiTi","WenQuanYi Micro Hei","WenQuanYi Zen Hei","Hiragino Sans GB" !important;font-size:14px !important;line-height:15pt !important;}
